title: FP to move economy to LR equilibrium

content.question: If equilibrium <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> is less than potential <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math>, which of the following is a fiscal policy action that could move the economy to long-run equilibrium?

choices.label: An increase in the money supply
A decrease in business income tax credits

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
